StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllWaiversNotAllowedByProgram]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ProgramAvailabilityID int, @ProgramAssignmentDate date.me, @ContractID int ) AS
DECLARE @ProgramID int DECLARE @E.ec.veDate date.me DECLARE @NWAID int
--- Get the ProgramID for the given ProgramAvailabilityID SELECT @ProgramID = PROGRAM_ID FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID
--- Get the ac.ve e.ec.ve date SELECT @E.ec.veDate = MAX(PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE) FROM PROGRAM_CRITERIA PC WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PC.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID AND PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE <= @ProgramAssignmentDate
--- Get the NWAID for the given ContractID SELECT @NWAID = C.NWA_ID FROM CONTRACT C WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- RETRIEVE ANY WAIVERS ASSIGNED TO THE APPLICANT THAT MEET THE FOLLOWING CRITERIA: --- 1. Waiver must be disallowed for the speci.ed program criteria record --- 2. Applicant must not have an approved XYB waiver override for the waiver --- If these three condi.ons are met, then return data about the waiver to the --- calling rou.ne since the applicant is not quali.ed for this program. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT CW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID, W.WAIVER_ID, WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, WT.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER CW WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER P ON (CW.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND CW.WAIVER_ID = P.WAIVER_ID AND P.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID AND P.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = @E.ec.veDate) INNER JOIN WAIVER W ON CW.WAIVER_ID = W.WAIVER_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_CATEGORY WC ON W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_TYPE WT ON W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = WT.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_LEVEL WL ON W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER CPCW INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_WAIVER CW1 ON (CW1.NWA_ID = CW.NWA_ID AND CW1.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = CPCW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID) WHERE CPCW.WAIVER_ID = CW.WAIVER_ID)
